overview: Alba and Martín start a journey in the Spanish southeast. Their first stop is an isolated farmhouse in the middle of the desert, whose esplanade is full of furnitureS and objects for sale. As they silently observe these relics belonging to broken relationships, they perceive the nostalgia for an already exhausted feeling, whose last gasps show them that their journey is a flight forward.
tagline: Intimate and generational drama, told from the point of view of three female protagonists.
title: The Sunrise Triangle
